concept.title: Comparison Window
concept.shortdesc: The Record Deduplicator caches record information for comparison until it reaches a specified number of records. Then, it discards the information in the cache and starts over.

conbody.p: You can configure a time limit to trigger a cache refresh at regular time intervals. When you configure a time limit, the time limit takes precedence over the record limit.
When you stop the pipeline, the Record Deduplicator discards all information in memory.
